biotools.summary: PGAP (pan-genome analysis pipeline) can perform five analytic functions with only one command, including cluster analysis of functional genes, pan-genome profile analysis, genetic variation analysis of functional genes, species evolution analysis and function enrichment analysis of gene clusters.

bioschemas.name: PGAP
bioschemas.summary: PGAP (pan-genome analysis pipeline) can perform five analytic functions with only one command, including cluster analysis of functional genes, pan-genome profile analysis, genetic variation analysis of functional genes, species evolution analysis and function enrichment analysis of gene clusters.
